meanings.definition: Having the properties of healing or curing
meanings.sent1: The medicinal herbs helped soothe her sore throat.
meanings.sent2: She brewed a medicinal tea to alleviate her headache.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the medicinal plant was a new toy.
meanings.sent4: His laughter had a medicinal effect on her mood.
meanings.sent5: The medicinal ointment worked wonders on his skin rash.

meanings.definition: Used for treating or preventing illness or disease
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed a medicinal syrup for her cough.
meanings.sent2: The medicinal properties of garlic are well-known.
meanings.sent3: She jokingly called the bitter medicine her 'medicinal dessert'.
meanings.sent4: His words acted as a medicinal balm for her troubled mind.
meanings.sent5: The medicinal aroma of eucalyptus filled the room.

meanings.definition: Relating to the practice of medicine
meanings.sent1: She pursued a career in the medicinal field.
meanings.sent2: The medicinal staff worked tirelessly to save lives.
meanings.sent3: The medicinal conference was attended by doctors from around the world.
meanings.sent4: His voice had a medicinal quality that calmed the patients.
meanings.sent5: The medicinal textbook was filled with valuable information.
